title: Ticket response time. HELP PLOX
body: I was just wondering how long the usual response time to tickets are. I usually get a response in around 2 days, but this time my ticket is soon to be 5 days in without response. I really hope the ticket doesn't stretch past the weekend so i can play the game. :\

replies.body: Typically the usual response time is around 14ish hours, but I did go ahead and check up on this accounts tickets for you. It looks like it had a ticket that was recently updated on Sunday, and they should be getting back to it before much longer.
Is it possible before the weekend ? :)
I'm gonna poke someone right now for ya fam. It might still take a bit depending on how busy that team is today, but gonna try to speed this up a bit for you ^_^

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

Do my best to help when possible ^_^
